games.name: Drawful Animate
games.description: It’s alive! The guessing game with terrible drawings and hilariously wrong answers makes a dynamic return. In this revamped title, players create looping, two-frame animations based on weird and random titles.

games.name: Job Job
games.description: Use other people’s words to create unique and funny answers to classic job interview questions. Go head to head to see who scores the job!

games.name: The Poll Mine
games.description: A survey game that’s all about YOU! Split into teams and see who can escape from the witch’s lair! Players individually rank their choices to a difficult question, then must guess how the group answered as a whole.

games.name: Weapons Drawn
games.description: A social deduction game where everyone is both a murderer and a detective. Players doodle all the clues, hiding a letter from their name in the weapon drawings. Can you solve murders while trying to get away with your own?

games.name: The Wheel of Enormous Proportions
games.description: Trivia has never been so large! A fantastic, mystical wheel challenges you with a variety of trivia prompts. Winners are awarded slices of the Wheel’s face with a chance to win big with each nail-biting spin. In the end, one player will have their most burning question answered by the great Wheel.
